column5: We are conveniently located near Westpark tollway, I-10 and Grand Parkway for easy access to Houston. We are offering a bedroom and bathroom in a quiet suburban neighborhood. You must appreciate fur babies. We have a blind dog and 2 long haired Chihuahuas. The fur babies are not used to hosting Airbnb guests and are learning however, they may bark until they settle down at the beginning of your arrival.
